nodes.text: The Mandalorian foundling and bounty hunter Jango Fett was instructed by a mentor some time before the former's death at the First Battle of Geonosis in 22 BBY. A portion of the mentor's name was recorded within the chain code of Jango's clone son, Boba, in which it was written in the Mando'a script. The name was partially spelled as "Jaste."

The mentor was mentioned on a hologram in "Chapter 14: The Tragedy" of Jon Favreau's Disney+ series The Mandalorian, directed by Robert Rodriguez and released on December 4, 2020. The character's name was partially obscured within the episode, which made it difficult to determine the individual's full name.

In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Jango Fett's mentor was Journeyman Protector Jaster Mereel, who first appeared in flashbacks in the comic Jango Fett: Open Seasons 1, written by Haden Blackman, penciled by Ramón F. Bachs, and published by Dark Horse Comics in 2002.
